name: Mirah.hpi
tagline: Attempt to write a Hudson's plugin with Mirah
body:
Mirah.hpi
---------

Hudson's plugin to execute Mirah scripts. Mirah and JRuby must be in the Hudson's path.
The plugin's source code is also written with Mirah.

Compile and test it with Hudson
-------------------------------

`mvn compile hpi:run`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
